name: Santorini, Greece
summary: Iconic white-washed buildings and stunning sunsets on this volcanic island paradise.
description: Experience the breathtaking beauty of Santorini with its iconic white-washed buildings, stunning sunsets, and crystal-clear waters. This volcanic island offers a perfect blend of romance, luxury, and Greek culture.
tips: Visit in shoulder season for fewer crowds

name: Miami, Florida
summary: Vibrant beach city with art deco architecture, world-class dining, and endless nightlife.
description: Miami pulses with energy, from South Beach's art deco glamour to Little Havana's Cuban culture. Enjoy pristine beaches, world-class dining, and a nightlife scene that never sleeps.

name: Tokyo, Japan
summary: Ultra-modern metropolis blending ancient traditions with cutting-edge technology and incredible cuisine.
description: Tokyo seamlessly merges ancient traditions with futuristic innovation. From serene temples to neon-lit streets, world-class sushi to robot restaurants, this megacity offers endless discoveries.
tips: Get a JR Pass for transport

name: Paris, France
summary: The City of Light enchants with world-class museums, romantic ambiance, and exquisite cuisine.
description: Paris captivates with its timeless elegance, from the Eiffel Tower to charming cafés. Art, fashion, and culinary excellence come together in this romantic capital.
tips: Visit museums on first Sunday mornings

name: Bali, Indonesia
summary: Tropical paradise with lush rice terraces, spiritual temples, and pristine beaches.
description: Bali offers a perfect blend of natural beauty, spiritual culture, and tropical luxury. From ancient temples to world-class surf breaks, this island paradise rejuvenates the soul.

name: New York City
summary: The city that never sleeps - Broadway shows, world-class museums, and iconic landmarks.
description: NYC is an urban playground of endless possibilities. From Broadway theaters to world-class museums, iconic skylines to diverse neighborhoods, every corner tells a story.

name: Iceland Ring Road
summary: Epic road trip through otherworldly landscapes, geysers, waterfalls, and Northern Lights.
description: Iceland's Ring Road offers one of the world's most spectacular drives. Witness powerful waterfalls, active geysers, glacier lagoons, and the magical Aurora Borealis.

name: Machu Picchu, Peru
summary: Ancient Incan citadel perched high in the Andes Mountains, a UNESCO World Heritage wonder.
description: Machu Picchu stands as one of the world's most iconic archaeological sites. This ancient Incan city offers breathtaking mountain views and mysterious history.

name: Thai Islands
summary: Tropical paradise islands with crystal-clear waters, pristine beaches, and vibrant marine life.
description: Thailand's islands offer some of the world's most beautiful beaches and clearest waters. From bustling Phuket to serene Koh Phi Phi, each island has its own character.

name: Tuscany, Italy
summary: Rolling hills, medieval towns, world-class wines, and Renaissance art in Italy's heartland.
description: Tuscany enchants with its rolling vineyards, hilltop towns, and artistic heritage. From Florence's Renaissance masterpieces to Chianti's wine cellars, beauty abounds.

name: Safari Kenya
summary: Witness the Great Migration and Big Five animals in world-renowned national parks.
description: Kenya offers unparalleled wildlife experiences. From the Masai Mara's Great Migration to Amboseli's elephant herds, witness nature's most spectacular displays.

name: Swiss Alps
summary: Majestic mountain peaks, pristine lakes, charming villages, and world-class skiing.
description: The Swiss Alps offer breathtaking mountain scenery, luxury resorts, and outdoor adventures. From Matterhorn's iconic peak to Jungfraujoch's glaciers, nature reigns supreme.

name: Australian Outback
summary: Vast red landscapes, unique wildlife, Aboriginal culture, and the iconic Uluru monolith.
description: Australia's Outback offers raw natural beauty and ancient culture. From Uluru's spiritual significance to unique wildlife encounters, this vast wilderness captivates.

name: Northern Norway
summary: Midnight sun, Northern Lights, dramatic fjords, and authentic Sami culture above the Arctic Circle.
description: Northern Norway offers unique Arctic experiences. From the midnight sun in summer to Northern Lights in winter, this region showcases nature's most dramatic phenomena.

name: Morocco Atlas Mountains
summary: Berber villages, mountain treks, traditional markets, and stunning desert landscapes.
description: Morocco's Atlas Mountains offer cultural immersion and natural beauty. Trek through Berber villages, explore bustling souks, and experience Sahara Desert magic.

name: Patagonia
summary: Dramatic landscapes spanning Argentina and Chile with glaciers, peaks, and pristine wilderness.
description: Patagonia offers some of Earth's most dramatic scenery. From massive glaciers to towering peaks, this region at the world's end captivates adventurers.

name: Rajasthan, India
summary: Royal palaces, vibrant colors, desert landscapes, and rich cultural heritage in India's crown jewel.
description: Rajasthan showcases India's royal heritage with magnificent palaces, colorful markets, and desert adventures. This 'Land of Kings' offers an immersive cultural experience.

name: Vancouver, Canada
summary: Cosmopolitan city surrounded by mountains and ocean, perfect blend of urban and nature.
description: Vancouver combines urban sophistication with natural beauty. From Stanley Park's seawall to Grouse Mountain's peaks, this city offers the best of both worlds.

name: Scottish Highlands
summary: Dramatic landscapes, ancient castles, whisky distilleries, and legendary lochs including Loch Ness.
description: Scotland's Highlands offer rugged beauty and rich history. From misty mountains to historic castles, this region embodies romance and adventure.

name: Maldives
summary: Overwater bungalows, crystal-clear lagoons, pristine coral reefs, and ultimate luxury relaxation.
description: The Maldives represents tropical paradise perfection. With overwater villas, pristine reefs, and azure waters, this Indian Ocean nation offers ultimate relaxation.

name: Vietnam
summary: Rich history, stunning landscapes, incredible street food, and warm hospitality from north to south.
description: Vietnam offers incredible diversity from Ha Long Bay's limestone karsts to Mekong Delta's floating markets. Rich history, delicious cuisine, and friendly people await.

name: Prague, Czech Republic
summary: Fairy-tale medieval city with stunning architecture, craft beer culture, and rich musical heritage.
description: Prague enchants with its medieval charm and architectural splendor. From the iconic castle to traditional beer halls, this Central European gem captivates visitors.

name: Jordan
summary: Ancient Petra, desert landscapes, Dead Sea, and warm Bedouin hospitality in the heart of the Middle East.
description: Jordan combines ancient wonders with natural beauty. From Petra's rose-red city to Wadi Rum's desert landscapes, this kingdom offers unforgettable experiences.

name: Croatian Coast
summary: Crystal-clear Adriatic waters, medieval towns, island hopping, and stunning national parks.
description: Croatia's coast offers Mediterranean charm with crystal-clear waters and historic towns. From Dubrovnik's walls to Plitvice's waterfalls, beauty abounds.

name: Chile Wine Country
summary: World-class wineries, stunning Andes backdrop, gourmet cuisine, and charming colonial towns.
description: Chile's wine regions offer world-class vintages against dramatic Andean backdrops. From Casablanca's cool climate wines to Colchagua's reds, oenophiles rejoice.

name: Myanmar
summary: Golden pagodas, ancient temples, floating markets, and authentic Buddhist culture largely untouched by tourism.
description: Myanmar offers authentic Southeast Asian culture with magnificent temples and warm hospitality. From Bagan's temple plains to Inle Lake's floating gardens, discover hidden treasures.

name: Azores, Portugal
summary: Volcanic islands with hot springs, crater lakes, pristine nature, and authentic Portuguese culture.
description: The Azores offer unspoiled natural beauty in the Atlantic. From volcanic hot springs to emerald crater lakes, these islands provide tranquil escape and adventure.

name: Uzbekistan
summary: Silk Road cities, stunning Islamic architecture, desert fortresses, and rich Central Asian culture.
description: Uzbekistan showcases Silk Road grandeur with magnificent Islamic architecture and rich cultural heritage. From Samarkand's blue domes to Bukhara's ancient streets, history comes alive.

name: Faroe Islands
summary: Remote Nordic islands with dramatic cliffs, grass-roof houses, pristine nature, and unique culture.
description: The Faroe Islands offer untouched Nordic beauty with dramatic landscapes and unique culture. From grass-roof villages to towering cliffs, this remote archipelago captivates.

name: Madagascar
summary: Unique wildlife, endemic species, diverse landscapes, and Malagasy culture on the world's fourth-largest island.
description: Madagascar offers unparalleled biodiversity with 90% endemic species. From lemurs to baobab trees, this island continent provides unique wildlife encounters and cultural experiences.

name: Slovenia
summary: Fairy-tale Lake Bled, Ljubljana's charm, wine regions, and pristine Alpine scenery in compact Europe.
description: Slovenia packs incredible diversity into a small country. From Lake Bled's island church to Ljubljana's dragon bridge, this hidden European gem offers Alpine beauty and charm.

name: Socotra Island, Yemen
summary: Alien-like landscapes, endemic flora, pristine beaches, and unique ecosystems on UNESCO World Heritage island.
description: Socotra Island feels like another planet with its unique dragon's blood trees and endemic species. This UNESCO site offers otherworldly beauty and pristine nature.

name: Bhutan
summary: Last Shangri-La with Buddhist monasteries, pristine Himalayas, unique culture, and Gross National Happiness philosophy.
description: Bhutan offers authentic Himalayan culture with its philosophy of Gross National Happiness. From Tiger's Nest monastery to pristine valleys, this kingdom preserves ancient traditions.

name: Easter Island, Chile
summary: Mysterious moai statues, Polynesian culture, remote Pacific location, and archaeological wonders.
description: Easter Island captivates with its mysterious moai statues and Polynesian culture. This remote Pacific island offers unique archaeological wonders and cultural experiences.

name: Palawan, Philippines
summary: Last frontier with underground rivers, pristine lagoons, island hopping, and crystal-clear waters.
description: Palawan represents the Philippines' last frontier with pristine nature and crystal-clear waters. From underground rivers to hidden lagoons, this province offers tropical paradise.

name: Tasmania, Australia
summary: Wilderness island with unique wildlife, pristine nature, MONA art museum, and cool climate wines.
description: Tasmania offers wilderness adventures and cultural experiences. From Cradle Mountain's peaks to MONA's provocative art, this island state surprises and delights.

name: Georgian Wine Country
summary: Ancient winemaking traditions, stunning Caucasus Mountains, warm hospitality, and unique qvevri wines.
description: Georgia offers the world's oldest winemaking tradition with unique qvevri wines and Caucasus Mountain beauty. Experience legendary hospitality and ancient culture.

name: Kamchatka, Russia
summary: Remote volcanic peninsula with geysers, brown bears, pristine wilderness, and helicopter adventures.
description: Kamchatka offers one of Earth's last wildernesses with active volcanoes, geysers, and abundant wildlife. This remote peninsula provides ultimate adventure experiences.

name: Rwanda
summary: Mountain gorillas, rolling hills, conservation success, vibrant culture, and remarkable recovery story.
description: Rwanda showcases Africa's conservation success with mountain gorillas and pristine national parks. Experience the 'Land of a Thousand Hills' and remarkable cultural resilience.

name: Lapland, Finland
summary: Arctic wilderness, reindeer herding, Northern Lights, midnight sun, and authentic Sami culture.
description: Lapland offers authentic Arctic experiences with Northern Lights, reindeer, and Sami culture. From glass igloos to husky sledding, this region provides magical moments.

name: Oman
summary: Arabian Peninsula gem with dramatic landscapes, frankincense heritage, pristine beaches, and warm hospitality.
description: Oman offers authentic Arabian experiences with dramatic mountains, pristine beaches, and rich heritage. From frankincense trails to turtle watching, discover hidden Arabia.

name: Albania
summary: Hidden Balkan gem with pristine beaches, mountain villages, rich history, and affordable adventure.
description: Albania offers undiscovered beauty with pristine Riviera beaches, mountain villages, and rich history. This affordable Balkan destination provides authentic experiences.

name: Sark, Channel Islands
summary: Car-free island with dark skies, dramatic cliffs, peaceful atmosphere, and unique feudal system.
description: Sark offers tranquil escape with car-free living and pristine dark skies. This unique Channel Island provides peaceful retreat and stunning coastal scenery.

name: Lord Howe Island, Australia
summary: UNESCO World Heritage island with pristine nature, limited visitors, unique wildlife, and coral reefs.
description: Lord Howe Island limits visitors to preserve its pristine environment. This UNESCO site offers unique wildlife encounters and untouched natural beauty.

name: Vanuatu
summary: Melanesian culture, active volcanoes, pristine diving, tribal traditions, and happy island life.
description: Vanuatu offers authentic Melanesian culture with active volcanoes and pristine reefs. Experience tribal traditions and discover why it's known as the happiest place on Earth.

name: Pitcairn Islands
summary: World's most remote populated island, Bounty mutineer history, pristine nature, and tiny population.
description: Pitcairn Island represents ultimate isolation with only 50 residents. Discover Bounty mutineer history and experience life on one of the world's most remote inhabited islands.
